name: Siddhii
greetingText: Calling you Siddhi feels illegal now, you're officially my cute Mauu ;)
wishText: May you achieve everything in life Mauuu!
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: Now come back and tell me if you like it
replayText: I'm waiting for your call Mauuuuuuuu
